title: RIOT fix your game
body: So essentially you fail to log me in to matchmaking then you hit me with a dodge timer I love riot seriously why don't you fix this!!!!

replies.body: I'm not seeing any server issues currently, but I'll certainly keep my eye out.  In the meantime, the details you're reporting strongly suggest a network issue struggling to reach our services and kicking you off.  I recommend going to customs for now and using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this instability.  I hope that helps!
